title: MAGA Protesters Take to the Streets as Donald Trump's Lawsuits Fail | Ta-Nehisi Coates
itunes:title: MAGA Protesters Take to the Streets as Donald Trump's Lawsuits Fail | Ta-Nehisi Coates
description:
President Trump keeps insisting he won re-election, Desi Lydic tries to reason with her paranoid "cousin" Tucker Carlson, and Ta-Nehisi Coates discusses two film adaptations of his books.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
